tool.name: ShortRead: Fastq QC

param.name: input_file
param.label: Short read sequence data from your current history

param.name: out_prefix
param.label: Title for the output file - to remind you what the job was for

tool.help:
This tool uses the Bioconductor ShortRead package to report some QC metrics on fastq, groomed fastq (fastqsanger) and bowtie output files. For package documentation see http://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/vignettes/ShortRead/inst/doc/Overview.pdf
